dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: Interpretation
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table was designed to allow users other than the author of the plot to interpret taxon names and authorities used to describe a population.
entity.entityDescription: The development of this table was initiated at the working group meeting at NCEAS in September 2000. The desire to re-interpret the taxon names used by the plot author was realized and this table subsequently initiated.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the interpretation table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a unique interpretation of a taxon used in a plot observation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the party table.
attribute.attDefinition: This key links a party to an interpretation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the taxonObservation table.
attribute.attDefinition: This key 'links' the interpretation to a particular taxon recognized in a plot.

attribute.attNotes: This is the foreign key into the plantTaxa database, that will store the circumscription corresponding to the re-interpretaion of the taxon.
attribute.attDefinition: Circumscription number updated from the plant taxa database.
This is the role of the party making the interpretation. Expected values may be: author, interpreter.

attribute.attNotes: This is the date that the interpretation was made.

attribute.attDefinition: These are the notes that the interpreter would like to include with the interpretation.
